s_synopsis: Well now, an uninvited guest! We don't get many visitors knocking at our door way out here. Now don't be afraid. I'm very sorry to hear about your car. Driving a little too fast, were we? Well, everything is all right now, come along inside. Don't mind the door... the hinges squeak a bit. And if I were you, I wouldn't look too closely at those shadows. One never knows what might be lurking around this musty old place. What's that? You just want to find your brother, use the phone, and go? After so short a stay? Well, if you can find a phone you can certainly use it, and as to the leaving, I suppose anything is possible...
